document_data.name: Champions Vigilant
document_data.mainbody: The '''Champions Vigilant''' was a [[Tethyr]]ian knightly order of [[Helm]]. These [[fighter]]s, [[cleric]]s and [[paladin]]s were prestigious and popular throughout the realm. The order had fortified bases dotting the countryside, such as in [[Survale Ford]], and cities like [[Velen]] and [[Saradush]].
document_data.History: The order was founded in [[1164 DR]], during the reign of King [[Coram III]]. They served the kingdom valiantly during the [[Tethyrian Interregnum]], saving thousands of lives from bandits and corrupt despots.
